acceptance_criteria: AC-3: Form validates password (min 8 chars, uppercase, lowercase, number)
AC-3: Form validates password confirmation matches
content.self_validation_notes: Layer 2 (Coordinator) - 2026-02-28 03:06 EST: Commit 0ca2aad implements Zod schema with zodResolver for React Hook Form. Validation rules: username min 3, password min 8 with complexity, confirm match. Error display integrated.
content.validation_requirements: Use Playwright to test /sign-up form: verify validation errors appear for invalid input, form submission blocked when invalid, proper error messages shown
